user.title: Connect to the device
user.description: Enter device id of the device you want to add (MAC-address in lower case, e.g. aabbccddeeff).

confirm.description: Do you want to add the Apple TV named `{name}` to Home Assistant?
confirm.title: Discovered Apple TV

zeroconf.lookup_id_failed: Failed to look up device id for device.

error.device_not_found: Device could not be found on network, verify the specified device id.
